snippet: Danspace Project presented the New York premiere of Trajal Harrell’s latest and final live iteration of a series he has been developing for about five years.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews premier of Trajaj Harrell's Judson Church Is Ringing in Harlem (Made to Measure), presented by Danspace Project at St Mark's Church.
lead_paragraph: Danspace Project presented the New York premiere of Trajal Harrell’s latest and final live iteration of a series he has been developing for about five years.

headline.seo: ‘Judson Church Is Ringing in Harlem’ at St. Mark’s
headline.main: Tension Is Uncorked Before a Parting
headline.print_headline: Tension is Uncorked Before a Parting
